channel.title: Tools on et cetera
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on et cetera

item.title: git
item.description: submodule # # add submodule git submodule add https://github.com/wineinlib/wineinlib.github.io.git public # sync git submodule update --init --recursive # remove rm -rf public rm -rf .git/modules/public git rm --cached public

item.title: rsync
item.description: user and group mapping # rsync --numeric-ids --usermap="0:1000000,10:1000010" --groupmap="0:1000000,10:1000010" ... rsync over ssh # rsync -e 'ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no' ...
